headline: AI Can Unlock $4.5 Trillion in U.S. Labor Productivity Today, Reveals Cognizant's Latest "New Work, New World 2026" Report
summary: Cognizant today announced the release of "New Work, New World 2026," providing fresh analysis on how artificial intelligence (AI) will impact work and jobs. Building on the original report's release in 2024, the new research reveals AI is changing the workforce faster than previously reported: it's now capable of handling $4.5 trillion in U.S. work tasks and impacting potentially 93% of jobs today. However, the report also underscores that AI is not a blanket solution for advancing labor product
